mapper.select: select `id`,`goods_num`,`goods_code`,`goods_name`,`goods_count`,`goods_type`,`mfrsid`,`brandname`,`retail_price`, `price_sum`,`cost_price`,`cost_sum`,`whole_price`,`whole_sum`,`position_name`,`create_time`,`danju_number`, `order_number`,`yundan_number`,`zhidan_people`,`danju_day`,`tuihuo_number`,`factory_number`,`beizhu`,`unit`, `batch`,`zhuce_number`,`produce_day`,`useday`,`classtype`,`factory` from stock where id = #{value}
mapper.delete:
delete from stock where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select `id`,`goods_num`, goods_count as goodsCount from stock where goods_num = #{value} group by goods_num
